Package coffee.khyonieheart.eden.checkpoint

Class SecurityCore

java.lang.Object
coffee.khyonieheart.eden.module.EdenModule
coffee.khyonieheart.eden.checkpoint.SecurityCore
public class SecurityCore extends EdenModule
Checkpoint module class. Checkpoint handles various small security tasks, as well as providing two options for permissions managers in EdenPermissionManager and BukkitPermissionManager.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Yuki_emeralis

    • banUuid

      public static boolean banUuid(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, String kickMessage, String banMessage)
      Issue a UUID ban to a user. Users that have been UUID banned cannot join, and is immune to IP and username changes.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to issue a ban to.
      kickMessage - The message to send to the player when the ban is submitted.
      banMessage - The message to send when the player attempts to join.
      Returns:
      If the ban was successful or not.

    • pardonUuid

      public static boolean pardonUuid(String username)
      Pardons a UUID banned player.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the player to pardon.
      Returns:
      If the pardon was successful or not.

    • isBanned

      public static Option isBanned(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Check if the given player is UUID banned. If so, a UUID ban entry is supplied.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to check.
      Returns:
      If the player is UUID banned.

    • allUuidBans

      public List<String> allUuidBans()
      Obtains a list of all current UUID bans.
      Returns:
      A list of all current UUID bans.

    • export_log

      public static void export_log()
